title: Arbigny-sous-Varennes
text: Arbigny-sous-Varennes (, literally "Arbigny under <a href="Varennes-sur-Amance">Varennes</a>") is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Haute-Marne">Haute-Marne</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in the <a href="Grand%20Est">Grand Est</a> <a href="Regions%20of%20France">region</a> in northeastern <a href="France">France</a>.
